alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 8:31PM CDT until June 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Callaway, or 11 miles southwest of Broken Bow, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Callaway, Ansley, Mason City, Berwyn, Westerville, Buckeye, Pressey State Wildlife Management Area and Lodi. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 82 and 102. Highway 2 between mile markers 275 and 301. Highway 92 between mile markers 300 and 303. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
